info.name: LinkedIn Organization Lookup API
info.description:
The Organization Lookup API searches organizations and their profiles.

**Important Notes:**
- Organization lookup API is protected by 3-legged OAuth token
- Some API calls require that the authenticated member has the role type `ADMINISTRATOR` 
  for the requested organization
- APIs without administrative access return only limited fields: id, name, localizedName, 
  localizedWebsite, vanityName, logoV2, locations, primaryOrganizationType
- APIs with administrative access return all available Organization fields

**Input Parameter Rules:**
- All strings are case-insensitive
- Multiple words should be joined with a space (URL encoded as %20)
- Complete string is searched when including multiple words
- Wildcards and boolean logic not supported (*, ?, AND, OR)

Organization URNs are in the format `urn:li:organization:{organization id}` and 
represent a LinkedIn Company Page.

**Deprecation Notice:** Marketing Version 202411 has been sunset. Migrate to the 
latest versioned APIs to avoid disruptions.


Contact Support:
 Name: LinkedIn Developer Support

variable.description: The unique identifier for the organization

request.description:
Look up organization information on behalf of authenticated members with role type 
`ADMINISTRATOR` for that organization. 

API calls with insufficient permissions return 403 Forbidden.

Returns all available Organization fields when authenticated member has admin access.
